name: Break A Leg (itch) (Luiserchote)
description:
Break a leg

'Break A Leg'  is a cute game where you are a lucky rabbit. Maybe not so lucky!
You must escape from the gardenish maze where you ended up after your Space-carrot-ship crashed.

You will find a Fortune Teller who will help you fix your Space-carrot-ship in exchange for a lucky trip.

Chances are hidden in plain sight, so you must discover your own way to safety.

Avoid the blocking mushrooms, undergound moles and seemingly harmless chocolate (rabbits can't eat so much sugar!). 

Look for carrots and oranges to recover your  health and luck respectively!


Find Tarot Cards and depending on how lucky you are at the moment, you may trigger positive or negative effects!

If luck is on your side, you can get out of there before they make a lucky charm with your leg!

Control Credits
